metadata.name: PowerShell SAM Copy
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious PowerShell scripts accessing SAM hives

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\harddiskvolumeshadowcopy')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('system32\\config\\sam')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('copy-item')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cp $_.')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cpi $_.')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('copy $_.')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.file]::copy('))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious PowerShell scripts accessing SAM hives

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Some rare backup scenarios 2. PowerShell scripts fixing HiveNightmare / SeriousSAM ACLs Reference: https://twitter.com/splinter_code/status/1420546784250769408
